verses.verse: That which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning, <S%G746><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> we have heard, <S%G191><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> we have seen with <S%G3708><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> we saw, <S%G2300><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> touched, <S%G5584><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>

(and <S%G2532><s%> the life <S%G2222><s%> was revealed, <S%G5319><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we have seen, <S%G3708><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> testify, <S%G3140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> declare <S%G518><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> the life, <S%G2222><s%> the eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was revealed <S%G5319><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%>);

that which <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G518><s%> have seen <S%G3708><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> we <S%G518><s%> declare to you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may have <S%G2192><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us. <S%G2257><s%> Yes, <S%G2532><s%> and our <S%G2251><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> is with <S%G3326><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G1125><s%> write these things <S%G5023><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> our <S%G5216><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the message <S%G31><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> announce <S%G312><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> light, <S%G5457><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> darkness <S%G4653><s%> at all. <S%G3762><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> we say <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the darkness, <S%G4655><s%> we lie, <S%G5574><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4160><s%> tell the truth. <S%G225><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the light, <S%G5457><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the light, <S%G5457><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> cleanses <S%G2511><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> we say <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> we deceive <S%G4105><s%> ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us. <S%G2254><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> we confess <S%G3670><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> the sins, <S%G266><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to cleanse <S%G2511><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness. <S%G93><s%>
